error.err_autoconfPathRom: Roms Path for autoconfiguration can't be reached
error.err_NotRegistered: Sorry, your account can't be found (Check your login and password)

message.mess_autoconf_ask_Question: Do you want to use autoconfiguration ?
message.mess_ssh_killall: Are you sur you want to kill EmulationStation ?
message.mess_ssh_start: Are you sur you want to start EmulationStation ?
message.mess_ssh_reboot: Are you sur you want to reboot distant peripheral ?
message.mess_ssh_poweroff: Are you sur you want to halt distant peripheral ?
message.mess_update_Question: Do you want to download the updated version ?
message.mess_ssregister_GodMode: You are : a god, an half god (or at least a 2/3 god) or Chuck Norris. Be carreful !!!

win_config.win_config_LU_GroupScrap_Target_RomPath: Path to the roms in your XML file
win_config.win_config_LU_GroupImage_Source_ImagePat: Directory where pictures will be downloaded
win_config.win_config_LU_GroupImage_Target_ImagePat: Path to the picture in your XML file
win_config.win_config_Option_GroupParam:
Parameter to change
General configuration Misc Country preferences Language preferences Scrape Mode 0 - New File|1 - Update XML (Add New Rom) Picture Mode 0 - Language Pic|1 - Rom Pic|2 - Language Pic Strict|3 - Rom Pic Strict Log level 0 - Standard|1 - Advanced|2 - Full Add an enter for missing roms in XML Auto select your system Screenscraper Screenscraper Login Screenscraper Password Thread number Check Screenscraper Register Scraped files Included files Excluded files Excluded folders
Autoconfiguration path configuration Use autoconfiguration Scraper Root System directory XML file name Path to the roms in your XML file Picture Folder Name where pictures will be downloaded Path to the picture in your XML file
Save Cancel Avanced

win_Wizard_Profil.win_Wizard_Profil_Desc: Here You can select the profil corresponding to you OS.|!||!|MIX Version make picture with several other like screenshot, 3D box and Game logo.|!||!|You can change the MIX Profil in the menu : |!|"Change your Mix Images profil"|!|or later in this wizard.

win_Wizard_Autoconf.win_Wizard_Autoconf_Desc: The Autoconfiguration let you scrape your system without spending time in path configuration.|!||!|The default path (selected from you selected profil) is just under this text.|!|You can change it with your system root directory.|!||!|Exemple :|!|Your SNES roms are in|!|E:\Emulation\Rom\SNES,|!|so the root path will be|!|E:\Emulation\Rom

win_Wizard_MIX.win_Wizard_MIX_Desc: You choose a Profil with MIX Image|!||!|You can choose the picture generated by UXS template in the next window.|!||!|Warning, some MIX Image profil need a specifique theme in your FrontEnd.|!|(Exemple, The "Full Back" Profil need a specifique theme)|!|Thank you to visit the wiki if needed.

win_Wizard_END.win_Wizard_END_Desc: The basic UXS configuration is now done.|!||!|You can now select your system in|!|"Scrape"|!|->"Select your system (Autoconf)"|!|and launch your first Scrape.|!||!|Thank you for using Universal XML Scraper.

tips_config.tips_config_GroupScrap_PathRom: Répertoire dans lequel se trouve les roms à scrapper
tips_config.tips_config_GroupScrap_PathXML: Répertoire et nom du fichier XML généré par le scraper
tips_config.tips_config_GroupScrap_PathRomSub: Indication dans le fichier XML du chemin ou les roms seront trouvées en local
tips_config.tips_config_GroupImage_PathImage: Répertoire dans lequel les images seront téléchargées
tips_config.tips_config_GroupImage_PathImageSub: Indication dans le fichier XML du chemin ou les images seront trouvées en local
tips_config.tips_config_GroupImage_Extension: Extension des images (defaut = identique au site de scrape)
tips_config.tips_config_GroupAutoconf_PathRom: Répertoire dans lequel se trouve les différents systèmes à scraper
tips_config.tips_config_GroupAutoconf_PathXML: Nom du fichier XML généré par le scraper
tips_config.tips_config_GroupAutoconf_PathRomSub: Indication dans le fichier XML du chemin ou les roms seront trouvées en local
tips_config.tips_config_GroupAutoconf_PathImage: Nom du répertoire ou seront téléchargé les images
tips_config.tips_config_GroupAutoconf_PathImageSub: Indication dans le fichier XML du chemin ou les images seront trouvées en local
tips_config.tips_config_GroupAutoconf_Use: Activation du menu de Configuration Automatique
tips_config.tips_config_mode_new: Le scraper créera un nouveau fichier XML (écrase l'existant)
tips_config.tips_config_mode_append: Le scraper ajoutera les roms manquantes aux fichiers XML existants
tips_config.tips_config_mode_empty: Ajout d'entrées vide concernant les Roms non trouvées
tips_config.tips_config_mode_MAJ: Conversion en majuscule des valeurs scrapées
